item.title: About
item.description: Hi! My name is Tom Hale. Right now I’m working as a software engineer at Cognex Corporation outside of Boston, helping build the next generation of industrial barcode readers (yes, that is an industry, and a remarkably profitable one). I’ve wanted to be an engineer ever since I was five, when I realized that “professional cowboy” wasn’t in the cards. In all those years, I never really asked why. There was no real reason to; why wouldn’t you want to be an engineer?

item.title: Hello world!
item.description: Hi! I’m starting a blog! See my About page for more about me. This started as a side project after I foolishly bought the tomhale.me domain name. Sadly, I didn’t realize that a blog isn’t terribly useful unless you have something useful to say. I can easily get the same relief by screaming any errant thoughts out my window, and almost anything could have been a better use of my money.
